about_the_game:
You find yourself standing next to a suspicious looking house, drawn in by strange, unsettling noises from within. Armed with only a flashlight and a gun, you decide to investigate. What secrets lie behind the eerie silence and the unsettling atmosphere?

As you step into the dark and twisted halls, every creak and shadow puts your nerves on edge. You’ll search for clues, each discovery pulling you deeper into the house's horrifying past. But the deeper you delve, the more dangerous your situation becomes. Something watches your every move, lurking just out of sight.

Time is against you will you survive long enough to uncover the shocking truth, or will the house consume you first?

Key Features:

Immersive First-Person Exploration: Navigate the claustrophobic and oppressive corridors, where every shadow could be a clue or a threat waiting to strike.

Clue-Based Story Progression: Piece together fragments of a disturbing narrative as you search for hidden clues, documents, and eerie details. Every step brings you closer to revealing the house’s dark history if you can survive.

Atmospheric Horror: A terrifying audio visual experience that never lets up. With realistic environments, haunting soundscapes, and a dynamic soundtrack, the tension builds relentlessly as you explore.

Puzzle Solving: Challenge your mind with a series of intricate puzzles. Solve them to uncover more of the mystery, but beware each solution might draw you closer to danger.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features a tense and frightening atmosphere, enhanced by disturbing sounds and visuals. Players can expect to encounter realistic blood throughout the gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Explore a mysterious house filled with terrifying secrets. Armed with only a gun and flashlight, search for clues, survive dangerous encounters, and unravel the shocking truth behind the eerie silence in The Shattered Truth.
